summary: This document is an email chain from May 2020, forwarded by attorney Stacey Richman. It contains a forwarded message from Mark L. Epstein discussing a bizarre and threatening communication he received, which purports to be from a police officer offering to sell information about the death of his brother, referencing a prison guard named James. The email suggests attempts to obtain confidential police documents related to Jeffrey Epstein's case.

keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein received a threatening email in May 2020 purporting to be from police officers offering to sell confidential information about his brother's death.
The email references a prison guard named James who allegedly met with the sender's brother five days before his death.
The correspondence suggests attempts to obtain confidential police documents and witness testimony related to the Jeffrey Epstein case.
Attorney Stacey Richman was involved in the communication chain, indicating legal handling of the matter.
